backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a dashboard instructionalâ€‘text requirement to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing their roles in the Goals Dashboard app.
frontend/DEVELOPMENT.md: Developer guide outlining prerequisites and steps for local development and deployment on the Internet Computer.
frontend/env.json: Contains runtime configuration values such as the Internet Identity URL.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling including theme variables, dark mode settings, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting up font loading and mounting the React application root.
frontend/README.md: Project overview describing features of the Goals Dashboard and linking to development instructions.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React root component that renders the GoalsDashboard and initializes the Toaster.
frontend/src/components/CenteredNotifica: Centered auto-dismissing notification component that displays a temporary message overlay.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyCompletio: Large modal handling camera-based or uploaded photo celebrations, including capture flow, processing, and save notifications.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyMemorySha: Dropdown menu offering sharing actions for monthly memory images across system share, download, and social platforms.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyProgressD: SVG donut component that visually displays monthly progress using a colored circular progress ring.
frontend/src/components/MonthSelectionMo: Modal for selecting a month with a grid of month buttons and confirm/cancel actions.
frontend/src/components/YearlySummaryTab: Renders a yearly goals summary table with monthly stats, celebration modals, memory uploads, and checkbox-based UI state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and invalidates related queries when the identity changes.
Wraps useCamera to manage video readiness, stream events, and capture flow for celebration photos.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity login, persistence, status tracking, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file noting that no backend queries are needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, theme variables, and custom component styles including summary table checkbox and layout rules.
frontend/src/lib/celebrationImageComposi: Generates a Polaroid-style composite image by combining a selfie with an overlay badge and provides helpers for image loading and file-to-data-URL conversion.
frontend/src/lib/monthlyMemoryShare.ts: Provides utilities to share or download monthly memory images, including Web Share API usage and social share URL generators.
frontend/src/lib/monthlyMemoryStorage.ts: Handles saving, retrieving, clearing, and listing monthly memory images in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/months.ts: Exports a constant list of month names and a Month type union.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/GoalsDashboard.tsx: Implements the goals dashboard UI with predefined goal cards and interactions for managing goals.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS themes, colors, animations, and plugins for the project.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node-related files, enabling ESNext modules and composite builds.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite configuration for React, environment variables, path aliases, dev server proxy, and build settings.
project_state.json: Describes the project's state, features, and pending requests, including an instructional text addition feature.
